  • About

The eveGEnts Project

A new project will become an all-in-one, free and open-source event management and ticketing platform for student clubs.

Features

About

Student clubs often face the challenge of using multiple platforms to organize events, handle ticketing, and manage approvals. This fragmented approach leads to the duplication of information, wasting time and causing inefficiencies.

eveGEnts aims to solve these problems by providing a unified platform for event management, graphics design, request and approvals, and ticketing. By integrating these features, student clubs can streamline their workflows, reduce redundancy, and improve overall efficiency.

Additionally, the platform will offer both cloud and self-hosting options, allowing users to choose the best solution for their needs. Future plans include developing mobile apps for both Android and iOS to provide users with seamless access on the go, and supporting internationalization (i18n) to cater to a diverse user base with multiple languages.

eveGEnts will be built using a modern tech stack to ensure reliability and scalability. Key technologies include:

  • Frontend: React and Bootstrap for a responsive and user-friendly interface.
  • Backend: REST API built with the Spring Framework and FreeMarker for dynamic content rendering.
  • Database: PostgreSQL for robust data management.

This platform is based on the software called eTWIG , leveraging its proven capabilities to deliver a comprehensive solution for student clubs. By adopting these technologies, we aim to provide a seamless and efficient experience for all users.

Project Creator

Around the Web

Event Management

Our platform will revolutionize event organization with intuitive scheduling tools, enabling student clubs to create and manage event schedules effortlessly. It will simplify tracking attendance and handling event details, making event planning a seamless experience.

Graphics Design

We aim to provide built-in design tools that will allow users to create stunning banners and promotional materials easily. With customizable templates, even those without design experience will be able to produce professional-quality graphics to boost event visibility.

Requests and Approvals

The platform will streamline the approval process for event-related requests, such as banners and budgets. It will offer a centralized system for submitting, tracking, and managing requests, ensuring efficient and quick approval workflows.

Ticketing

Our future ticketing system will simplify ticket sales and distribution. It manages ticket sales, tracks attendee lists, and handles payments securely. With university SSO integration, controlling ticket types and ensuring secure access for students becomes more efficient.

Self and Cloud-Host

Our platform will offer both cloud and self-hosting options. The cloud solution provides easy access and maintenance, while self-hosting allows users to host the platform on their servers, ensuring customization, data privacy, and compliance with institutional policies.

Free and Open-Source

Our platform will be free and open-source, allowing anyone to use, modify, and distribute the software. This promotes transparency, collaboration, and continuous improvement, ensuring the platform evolves to meet users' needs.
